Edit user notification preferences#

If you are an administrator then you can edit notifications for the entire account:

  1. Select the Notifications tab.
  2. Select Edit Preferences in the upper-right of the notifications list.
  3. Select from the Users, Categories, and Devices tabs and use the checkboxes to edit your preferences.

Note

You canâ€™t disable Rackspace portal notifications.
